scripts.start:local: concurrently -n games,users,balance,payments,bonus,test-game,test-payment "npx dotenv-cli -e .env.local -- nest start games" "npx dotenv-cli -e .env.local -- nest start users" "npx dotenv-cli -e .env.local -- nest start balance" "npx dotenv-cli -e .env.local -- nest start payments" "npx dotenv-cli -e .env.local -- nest start bonus" "npx dotenv-cli -e .env.local -- nest start test-game-provider" "npx dotenv-cli -e .env.local -- nest start test-payment-provider"
scripts.migrate:all:dev: npm run migrate:users:dev && npm run migrate:balance:dev && npm run migrate:payments:dev && npm run migrate:games:dev && npm run migrate:bonus:dev && npm run migrate:test-payment-provider:dev && npm run migrate:test-game-provider:dev && npm run migrate:currency-rate:dev
scripts.migrate:all:deploy: npm run migrate:users:deploy && npm run migrate:balance:deploy && npm run migrate:payments:deploy && npm run migrate:games:deploy && npm run migrate:bonus:deploy && npm run migrate:test-payment-provider:deploy && npm run migrate:test-game-provider:deploy && npm run migrate:currency-rate:deploy
scripts.migrate:all:prod: npm run migrate:users:prod && npm run migrate:balance:prod && npm run migrate:payments:prod && npm run migrate:games:prod && npm run migrate:bonus:prod && npm run migrate:test-payment-provider:prod && npm run migrate:test-game-provider:prod
scripts.generate:all: npm run generate:users && npm run generate:balance && npm run generate:payments && npm run generate:games && npm run generate:bonus && npm run generate:test-payment-provider && npm run generate:test-game-provider && npm run generate:currency-rate
scripts.seed:all: npm run seed:users && npm run seed:payments && npm run seed:games && npm run seed:bonus && npm run seed:test-payment-provider && npm run seed:test-game-provider
scripts.migrate:users:dev: npx cross-env PRISMA_DB=users npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- prisma migrate dev --config=./prisma.config.ts --name init
scripts.migrate:users:deploy: npx cross-env PRISMA_DB=users npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- prisma migrate deploy --config=./prisma.config.ts
scripts.generate:users: npx cross-env PRISMA_DB=users npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- npx prisma generate --config=./prisma.config.ts
scripts.seed:users: npx cross-env PRISMA_DB=users npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- node prisma/users/seed.mjs
scripts.migrate:balance:dev: npx cross-env PRISMA_DB=balance npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- prisma migrate dev --config=./prisma.config.ts --name init
scripts.migrate:balance:deploy: npx cross-env PRISMA_DB=balance npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- prisma migrate deploy --config=./prisma.config.ts
scripts.generate:balance: npx cross-env PRISMA_DB=balance npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- npx prisma generate --config=./prisma.config.ts
scripts.migrate:payments:dev: npx cross-env PRISMA_DB=payments npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- prisma migrate dev --config=./prisma.config.ts --name init
scripts.migrate:payments:deploy: npx cross-env PRISMA_DB=payments npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- prisma migrate deploy --config=./prisma.config.ts
scripts.generate:payments: npx cross-env PRISMA_DB=payments npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- prisma generate --config=./prisma.config.ts
scripts.seed:payments: npx cross-env PRISMA_DB=payments npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- node prisma/payments/seed.mjs
scripts.migrate:test-payment-provider:dev: npx cross-env PGBOUNCER_TEST_PAYMENT_PROVIDER_DATABASE_URL=postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:5432/test_payment_provider_db npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- prisma migrate dev --config=./prisma.config.ts --name init
scripts.migrate:test-payment-provider:deploy: npx cross-env PRISMA_DB=test-payment-provider npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- prisma migrate deploy --config=./prisma.config.ts
scripts.generate:test-payment-provider: npx cross-env PRISMA_DB=test-payment-provider npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- prisma generate --config=./prisma.config.ts
scripts.seed:test-payment-provider: npx cross-env PRISMA_DB=test-payment-provider npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- node prisma/test-payment-provider/seed.mjs
scripts.seed:test-payment-provider:local: npx cross-env PRISMA_DB=test-payment-provider PAYMENTS_CALLBACK_HOST=localhost npx dotenv-cli -e .env.local -- node prisma/test-payment-provider/seed.mjs
scripts.migrate:games:dev: npx cross-env PRISMA_DB=games npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- prisma migrate dev --config=./prisma.config.ts --name init
scripts.migrate:games:deploy: npx cross-env PRISMA_DB=games npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- prisma migrate deploy --config=./prisma.config.ts
scripts.generate:games: npx cross-env PRISMA_DB=games npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- npx prisma generate --config=./prisma.config.ts
scripts.seed:games: npx cross-env PRISMA_DB=games npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- node prisma/games/seed.mjs
scripts.migrate:test-game-provider:dev: npx cross-env PRISMA_DB=test-game-provider npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- prisma migrate dev --config=./prisma.config.ts --name init
scripts.migrate:test-game-provider:deploy: npx cross-env PRISMA_DB=test-game-provider npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- prisma migrate deploy --config=./prisma.config.ts
scripts.generate:test-game-provider: npx cross-env PRISMA_DB=test-game-provider npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- npx prisma generate --config=./prisma.config.ts
scripts.seed:test-game-provider: npx cross-env PRISMA_DB=test-game-provider npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- node prisma/test-game-provider/seed.mjs
scripts.migrate:bonus:dev: npx cross-env PRISMA_DB=bonus npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- prisma migrate dev --config=./prisma.config.ts --name init
scripts.migrate:bonus:deploy: npx cross-env PRISMA_DB=bonus npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- prisma migrate deploy --config=./prisma.config.ts
scripts.generate:bonus: npx cross-env PRISMA_DB=bonus npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- prisma generate --config=./prisma.config.ts
scripts.seed:bonus: npx cross-env PRISMA_DB=bonus npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- node prisma/bonus/seed.mjs
scripts.migrate:currency-rate:dev: npx cross-env PRISMA_DB=currency-rate npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- prisma migrate dev --config=./prisma.config.ts --name init
scripts.migrate:currency-rate:deploy: npx cross-env PRISMA_DB=currency-rate npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- prisma migrate deploy --config=./prisma.config.ts
scripts.generate:currency-rate: npx cross-env PRISMA_DB=currency-rate npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- npx prisma generate --config=./prisma.config.ts
scripts.docker:build: node -e "const {APPS} = require('./scripts/version-manager'); APPS.forEach(app => { const {execSync} = require('child_process'); const version = require('./scripts/version-manager').getAppVersion(app); execSync(`docker build -f docker/Dockerfile.${app} -t ${app}:${version} .`, {stdio: 'inherit'}); });"
scripts.test:users: npm run test:users:unit && npm run test:users:integration
scripts.test:balance: npm run test:balance:unit && npm run test:balance:integration
scripts.test:payments: npm run test:payments:unit && npm run test:payments:integration
scripts.test:test-payment-provider: npm run test:test-payment-provider:unit && npm run test:test-payment-provider:integration
scripts.test:test-game-provider: npm run test:test-game-provider:unit && npm run test:test-game-provider:integration
scripts.test:games: npm run test:games:unit && npm run test:games:integration
scripts.test:bonus: npm run test:bonus:unit && npm run test:bonus:integration
scripts.test:all: npm run test:users && npm run test:balance && npm run test:payments && npm run test:test-payment-provider && npm run test:test-game-provider && npm run test:games && npm run test:bonus
scripts.test:all:unit: npm run test:users:unit && npm run test:balance:unit && npm run test:payments:unit && npm run test:test-payment-provider:unit && npm run test:test-game-provider:unit && npm run test:games:unit && npm run test:bonus:unit
scripts.test:all:integration: npm run test:users:integration && npm run test:balance:integration && npm run test:payments:integration && npm run test:test-payment-provider:integration && npm run test:test-game-provider:integration && npm run test:games:integration && npm run test:bonus:integration
